verses.verse: Knowest <S%H3045><s%> thou the <S%H6256>time<s%> when the wild <S%H3277>goats<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock<s%> bring <S%H3205>forth?<s%> or canst thou <S%H8104>mark<s%> when the <S%H355>hinds<s%> do <S%H2342>calve?<s%>
Canst thou <S%H5608>number<s%> the <S%H3391>months<s%> that they <S%H4390>fulfill?<s%> or <S%H3045>knowest<s%> thou the <S%H6256>time<s%> when they bring <S%H3205>forth?<s%>
They <S%H3766>bow<s%> themselves, they bring <S%H6398>forth<s%> their young <S%H3206>ones,<s%> they cast <S%H7971>out<s%> their <S%H2256>sorrows.<s%>
Their young <S%H1121>ones<s%> are in good <S%H2492>liking,<s%> they grow <S%H7235>up<s%> with <S%H1250>corn;<s%> they go <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> unto them.
Who <S%H4310><s%> hath sent <S%H7971>out<s%> the wild <S%H6501>ass<s%> <S%H2670>free?<s%> or <S%H4310>who<s%> hath <S%H6605>loosed<s%> the <S%H4147>bands<s%> of the wild <S%H6171>ass?<s%>
Whose <S%H834><s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> I have <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H6160>wilderness,<s%> and the barren <S%H4420>land<s%> his <S%H4908>dwellings.<s%>
He <S%H7832>scorneth<s%> the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of the <S%H7151>city,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H8085>regardeth<s%> he the <S%H8663>crying<s%> of the <S%H5065>driver.<s%>
The <S%H3491>range<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> is his <S%H4829>pasture,<s%> and he <S%H1875>searcheth<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> green <S%H3387>thing.<s%>
Will the <S%H7214>unicorn<s%> be <S%H14>willing<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> thee, <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H3885>abide<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> thy <S%H18>crib?<s%>

Canst thou <S%H7194>bind<s%> the <S%H7214>unicorn<s%> with his <S%H5688>band<s%> in the <S%H8525>furrow?<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> will he <S%H7702>harrow<s%> the <S%H6010>valleys<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> thee?
Wilt thou <S%H982>trust<s%> him, <S%H3588>because<s%> his <S%H3581>strength<s%> is <S%H7227>great?<s%> or wilt thou <S%H5800>leave<s%> thy <S%H3018>labor<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> him?
Wilt thou <S%H539>believe<s%> him, <S%H3588>that<s%> he will bring <S%H7725>home<s%> thy <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and <S%H622>gather<s%> it into thy <S%H1637>barn?<s%>
Gavest thou the <S%H5965>goodly<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%> unto the <S%H7443>peacocks?<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H84>wings<s%> and <S%H2624>feathers<s%> unto the <S%H5133>ostrich?<s%>
Which <S%H3588><s%> <S%H5800>leaveth<s%> her <S%H1000>eggs<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H2552>warmeth<s%> them <S%H5921>in<s%> <S%H6083>dust,<s%>
And <S%H7911>forgetteth<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H7272>foot<s%> may <S%H2115>crush<s%> them, or that the <S%H7704>wild<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> may <S%H1758>break<s%> them.
She is <S%H7188>hardened<s%> against her young <S%H1121>ones,<s%> as though they were <S%H3808>not<s%> hers: her <S%H3018>labor<s%> is in <S%H7385>vain<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H6343>fear;<s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> <S%H433>God<s%> hath <S%H5382>deprived<s%> her of <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> hath he <S%H2505>imparted<s%> to her <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
What <S%H6256>time<s%> she lifteth up <S%H4754>herself<s%> on <S%H4791>high,<s%> she <S%H7832>scorneth<s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%> and his <S%H7392>rider.<s%>
Hast thou <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%> <S%H1369>strength?<s%> hast thou <S%H3847>clothed<s%> his <S%H6677>neck<s%> with <S%H7483>thunder?<s%>
Canst thou make him <S%H7493>afraid<s%> as a <S%H697>grasshopper?<s%> the <S%H1935>glory<s%> of his <S%H5170>nostrils<s%> is <S%H367>terrible.<s%>
He <S%H2658>paweth<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley,<s%> and <S%H7797>rejoiceth<s%> in his <S%H3581>strength:<s%> he goeth <S%H3318>on<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> the armed <S%H5402>men.<s%>

He <S%H7832>mocketh<s%> at <S%H6343>fear,<s%> and is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2865>frightened;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> turneth he <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
The <S%H827>quiver<s%> <S%H7439>rattleth<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him, the <S%H3851>glittering<s%> <S%H2595>spear<s%> and the <S%H3591>shield.<s%>

He <S%H1572>swalloweth<s%> the <S%H776>ground<s%> with <S%H7494>fierceness<s%> and <S%H7267>rage:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H539>believeth<s%> he <S%H3588>that<s%> it is the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet.<s%>

He <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H1767>among<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> Ha, <S%H1889>ha;<s%> and he <S%H7306>smelleth<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%> afar <S%H4480>off,<s%> <S%H7350><s%> the <S%H7482>thunder<s%> of the <S%H8269>captains,<s%> and the <S%H8643>shouting.<s%>
Doth the <S%H5322>hawk<s%> <S%H82>fly<s%> by thy <S%H4480>wisdom,<s%> <S%H998><s%> and <S%H6566>stretch<s%> her <S%H3671>wings<s%> toward the <S%H8486>south?<s%>
Doth the <S%H5404>eagle<s%> mount <S%H1361>up<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> thy <S%H6310>command,<s%> and make her nest on <S%H7311>high?<s%> <S%H7064><s%>
She <S%H7931>dwelleth<s%> and <S%H3885>abideth<s%> on the <S%H5553>rock,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H8127>crag<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock,<s%> and the strong <S%H4686>place.<s%>
From <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> she <S%H2658>seeketh<s%> the <S%H400>prey,<s%> and her <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5027>behold<s%> afar <S%H4480>off.<s%> <S%H7350><s%>
Her young <S%H667>ones<s%> also suck <S%H5966>up<s%> <S%H1818>blood:<s%> and <S%H834>where<s%> the <S%H2491>slain<s%> are, <S%H8033>there<s%> is <S%H1931>she.<s%>
